items.title: Sanathan Textiles IPO: A fabric of growth or stitches of risk?
items.description: With favourable industry trends and strategic growth plans, Sanathan Textiles seeks to capitalise on emerging opportunities

items.title: Concord Enviro: Can the water treatment IPO make waves for investors?
items.description: Waste water management is a secular opportunity, but the company’s performance has to be consistent for valuation to rerate

items.title: DOMS Industries shares down 4% after FILA monetises part stake via block trade
items.description: DOMS Industries shareholder and Italian stationery maker FILA is selling up to 4.57% stake in the company via a block trade nearly a year after the IPO of the Indian unit, reducing its stake further to 26%.

items.title: Corporate Japan is steeling itself for hostile interest
items.description: The volume of shareholder activism and dealmaking by private equity has mushroomed
